entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
